articles.title: Serb gunmen battle police in Kosovo monastery siege; four dead - Reuters
articles.description: Ethnic Serb gunmen in armoured vehicles stormed a village in north Kosovo on Sunday, battling police and barricading themselves in a monastery in a resurgence of violence in <a href="/world/europe/why-kosovos-stand-off-with-serbs-goes-15-years-after-statehood…
articles.content: NORTH MITROVICA, Kosovo, Sept 24 (Reuters) - Ethnic Serb gunmen in armoured vehicles stormed a village in north Kosovo on Sunday, battling police and barricading themselves in a monastery in a resurg… [+4035 chars]

articles.author: Singh Rahul Sunilkumar
articles.title: Witness Earth's equal day and night: European Space Agency shares equinox photo - Hindustan Times
articles.description: European Space Agency shares a satellite image showcasing the Autumn equinox, marking the division of day and night on Earth's surface.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency (ESA) shared a satellite image on Saturday, showcasing a clear division of day and night on Earth's surface, representing the autumn equinox.
During an equinox, day and nig… [+2241 chars]
